bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld compact race design, 1.5" integrated headset, threaded BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, carbon legs, aluminum crown and steerer, 1.5" lower bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-1/5" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm cone spacer with 20mm of spacers
Specialized Elite, carbon wrapped alloy, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
